description: Community-approved overrides for sign semantic mappings

guidelines.breaking_change_definition: Any change to signGloss that significantly alters meaning

versioning_policy.minor: New mappings added, no changes to existing

notes: All overrides must be approved by Deaf community reviewers
Breaking changes require major version bump
System will use overrides when present, fall back to base mappings otherwise
Overrides are deployed separately from base system updates
